name: Greek-Inspired Grilled Turkey Sausage Brats
author: lutzflcat
summary: Enjoy a delicious grilled turkey sausage topped with fresh, crisp Greek-style veggies and tangy feta cheese.
ingredients: 4 medium turkey bratwurst sausage links (such as Jennie-O®)
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
⅓ cup crumbled feta cheese, or more to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Place sausages on the rack, and grill until sausages are cooked through, 10 to 16 minutes, turning occasionally
Your cooking time will depend on your grill and how close the sausages are to the heat
Check periodically with a meat thermometer until you reach 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), which is well done
Combine red onion, cucumber, tomatoes, and Kalamata olives in a small bowl
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, and stir in the oregano, salt, and pepper
Place the turkey sausages in the buns
Evenly distribute the Greek-style veggie mixture over the sausages, sprinkle with some feta cheese, and serve
